Package dev.nhuels.eventservice.controller

Class ArtistController

java.lang.Object
dev.nhuels.eventservice.controller.ArtistController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/artist") public class ArtistController extends Object
REST controller for managing artists. This controller provides endpoints for getting artist details, creating, updating, and deleting artists, and listing all artists.

    • getArtistDetails

      @GetMapping("/{artistId}/details") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArtistDetailsDto> getArtistDetails(@PathVariable @NotNull @NotNull Long artistId)
      Endpoint for getting the details of an artist.
      Parameters:
      artistId - the ID of the artist
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the details of the artist

    • createArtist

      @PostMapping("/create") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Long> createArtist(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid ArtistCreateDto artistCreateDto)
      Endpoint for creating a new artist.
      Parameters:
      artistCreateDto - the DTO containing the details of the artist to create
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the ID of the created artist

    • listArtists

      @GetMapping("/list") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Set<ArtistDetailsDto>> listArtists()
      Endpoint for listing all artists.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a set of all artists

    • updateArtist

      @PostMapping("/{artistId}/update") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateArtist(@PathVariable @NotNull @NotNull Long artistId, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid ArtistCreateDto artistCreateDto)
      Endpoint for updating an artist.
      Parameters:
      artistId - the ID of the artist to update
      artistCreateDto - the DTO containing the new details of the artist
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success message

    • deleteArtist

      @DeleteMapping("/{artistId}/delete") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'MODERATOR\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteArtist(@PathVariable @NotNull @NotNull Long artistId)
      Endpoint for deleting an artist.
      Parameters:
      artistId - the ID of the artist to delete
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a success message
